 II. [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁמַשׁ‎</span>] **verb Pa\`el** ==minister== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] **Pa\`el** ***id.***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תַּשְׁמִישׁ‎</span> ***use***; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שמש‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תשמיש‎</span>, [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>114</sup>, compare 122 [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>379</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Pa, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁמֵּשׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תַּשְׁמִישׁ‎</span>; Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šms***</u></abbr>, ***servant***, Coptic ***šemše***, compare [[BDB#WMM|WMM]] in [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>14</sup>); — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יְשַׁמְּשׁוּנֵּתּ‎</span> [[Dan.7.10|Dan 7:10]] ***were ministering to him.***
